Detailed Description

Checkable mixin All items that need checking should inherit this mixin. It adds the strictness level and the obligation to define chkHigh(), chkMedium() and chkLow()

virtual void Cp3::Tds::Checkable::chk (  )  [inline, virtual]

The main checking function, checking the basics and calling the appropriate function, corresponding to the strictness level

See also:
chkBasic, Strictness
virtual void Cp3::Tds::Checkable::chkBasic (  )  [inline, virtual]

If there is something central for the item to be checked, then it should override this
